description: Triggered when a new message is posted in a teams channel.

configSchema.name: channelUrl
configSchema.description: The share link of a teams channel

configSchema.name: mustMatch
configSchema.description: The message must match the given regex to be counted as a trigger, using this variable enable the Matches[i] placeholder to be used

placeholders.name: Words[i]
placeholders.description: The word at index i in the message.

placeholders.name: NbWords
placeholders.description: The number of words in the Words array

placeholders.name: Matches[i]
placeholders.description: The match at index i in the regex. /!\ Can only be used if mustMatch was given

placeholders.name: NbMatches
placeholders.description: The number of matches in the Matches array
